item.title: YPF
item.description: score:117 Chances: YPF SA’s plan to divest aging oil fields will free up hundreds of millions of dollars to invest in its shale push in the Vaca Muerta formation. The company has been highlighted in the Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy) value stocks list.

item.title: GME
item.description: score:147 Chances: The investment landscape has been abuzz with the trend of meme stocks, a phenomenon ushered in by the remarkable and dramatic rise in GameStopâ€™s stock in 2021. Investors know that the current expectations project rate cuts as early as March, which is a major positive for the economy overall and suggests that we have avoided a recession.
